events.name: eds-patient-banner-patient-selected
events.description: fires when a patient is selected in the patient list and outputs the corresponding object found in `patientsList`

events.name: eds-patient-banner-patient-data-expanded
events.description: fires when `isCollapsible` is enabled upon expanding patient data

events.name: eds-patient-banner-patient-data-collapsed
events.description: fires when `isCollapsible` is enabled upon collapsing patient data

events.name: eds-patient-banner-patient-removed
events.description: fires when `isTabsMode` is enabled upon removing patient from dropdown or tabs

properties.name: isCompressed
properties.description: Compresses content to be beneath and take up remaining width of viewport

properties.name: isDarkTheme
properties.description: forces patient-banner to render in a lights-off theme

properties.name: isDropdownHidden
properties.description: Property to hide dropdown. Note to see patient you must use `patient` property

properties.name: isIconHidden
properties.description: Property to hide patient banner icon

properties.name: isStacked
properties.description: An alternate variation to allow for patient data to be stacked

properties.name: panelHeaderInputPlaceholder
properties.description: Placeholder text when dropdown type is search

properties.name: patientsList
type
properties.description: Type of patient-banner, valid values are: `default`, `skinny` This is an optional property. By default, patient-banner will be rendered with type `default`.

EDSPatientBanner.description: The **patient banner** is a persistently displayed “at-a-glance” summary of basic demographic and key patient identifying information.
EDSPatientBanner.name: Patient Banner
EDSPatientBanner.usage:
Patient banner has 1 slot that you can use: patient-banner-header
`patient-banner-header` allows you to add headers before icon/name

Long value, usually 'Address', should be placed on the last place of patient's data. Also, label should not exceed 120px width to fit correctly.

eds-patient-banner is a web component that allows patient data to be displayed within side navigation or with masthead.

The following css variables are available for styling :

CSS Variable | Description
:----------------|:-------------
--eds-patient-banner-background-color | Background color for patient banner
--eds-patient-banner-text-color | Text color for patient banner
--eds-patient-banner-border-color | Border color for patient banner
--eds-patient-banner-icon-color | Icon color for patient banner
--eds-patient-banner-stacked-background-color | Background color for patient banner when stacked
